entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Gjoa Haven
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 08:24 AM MST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Ice Crystals, -40.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Gjoa Haven Airport 10:00 AM MST Monday 20 February 2023
Condition: Ice Crystals
Temperature: -40.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.8 kPa rising
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 59 %
Wind Chill: -52
Dewpoint: -45.3°C
Wind: NNE 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 39. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries this morning. Clearing this afternoon. Ice fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind becoming east 20 km/h late this morning. High minus 39. Wind chill minus 52 this morning and minus 57 this afternoon. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 09:00 AM MST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Clear. Low minus 46.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 46. Wind chill near minus 61. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 09:00 AM MST Monday 20 February 2023
